effect.name: Chroma Key Color (Texture)
effect.description:
This shader excludes the selected color causing the color to be invisible.
Last Updated: 2026-01-04 22:02
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Chroma Key Color (Texture) Shader | 1.3 (18.10.2025) */
parameter.description: This shader excludes the selected color causing the color to be invisible.

parameter.name: Color Key
parameter.description: This variable specifies which color to exclude.

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.
